items.content_text:
# Do we need all this social networks?

¬†

Now we have more social than ever and some of them are zombie walking between the living. Do we need more?

¬†

Yes because the old one are not in healthy situations.

¬†

- DeviantArt, Tumblr and Google Sites are the zombies, little money for up keeping, less for develop new functions¬†

- Truth Social and X/Twitter are the drunk uncle... Alive and kicking but with less and less people around with them and always the same

- Meta (Facebook, Instagram and Threads) are becoming the Far Social West where nobody is wrong and the community say what is true and false and we can‚Äôt tell if this will be a good or a bad decision

- Feeders: the new guy maybe it will become something big but for now it is the little guy

¬†

So which one will die first?

items.content_html:
Meta is taking us to more dystopian social media

This blog post from Meta where they announced the remove of the fact checking of the post and stuff posted on Meta.

And this is why they are doing it:

We‚Äôve seen this approach work on X ‚Äì where they empower their community to decide when posts are potentially misleading and need more context, and people across a diverse range of perspectives decide what sort of context is helpful for other users to see.

So Meta will be the place where the true is what the ‚ÄúCommunity‚Äù decide it is true and not what is a fact is true?

So If the community decide something like this

Elon Musk is a old lady with 4 legs

Now Elon Musk has 4 legs???

Thanks Internet
items.content_text:
# Meta is taking us to more dystopian social media


[This](https://about.fb.com/news/2025/01/meta-more-speech-fewer-mistakes/) blog post from Meta where they announced the remove of the fact checking of the post and stuff posted on Meta.


And this is why they are doing it:

	We‚Äôve seen this approach work on X ‚Äì where they empower their community to decide when posts are potentially misleading and need more context, and people across a diverse range of perspectives decide what sort of context is helpful for other users to see. 


So Meta will be the place where the true is what the ‚ÄúCommunity‚Äù  decide it is true and not what is a fact is true?


So If the community decide something like this


	Elon Musk is a old lady with 4 legs


Now Elon Musk has 4 legs???


Thanks Internet

items.content_html:
Thinking about my old site and If I want to keep it or not like this.

If I don’t keep it, I will archived it and put something new in the same url…
